title: Drawing, "Design for Woven Textile with Large Flowers", ca. 1960
medium: Crayon on two joined sheets of graph paper
inscribed: Recto:  inscribed in red crayon along left edge:  numbers from 1 (bottom) to 35 (top); across upper third of sheet:  numbers from 1(left) to 28 (right); Verso:  in graphite, lower left:  mathematical notations, unreadable drawing
creditline: Gift of Mr. Eric and Mrs. Sylvia Elsesser, The Trude Guermonprez Archives
description: Beneath and arch-shaped line, large, brightly-colored (red, purple, orange, green, white) abstract flowers, perhaps resting on a table and seen from above.  This is color version of 1993-121-81.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Design for Woven Textile with Large Flowers", ca. 1960.
ca. 1960. Crayon on two joined sheets of graph paper. Gift of Mr. Eric and Mrs. Sylvia Elsesser, The Trude Guermonprez Archives. 1993-121-80.
